description:
<link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link>.
When an ally gets <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link>, give it +3|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw:
Support: Give my supported ally Barrier.
When an ally gets Barrier, give it +3|+0 this round.
flavorText: ...Their actions exist in harmony, and under my watch, neither shall overtake the other.
name: Shen
